respStmt.resp: Transcribed from images of original letters
respStmt.name: Sarah Tew

publicationStmt.distributor: The Center for the Tebtunis Papyri, The University of California, Berkeley
publicationStmt.authority: The Board of Trinity College Dublin, The University of Dublin

availability.p: Available for academic research purposes only.

objectDesc.p: Handwritten postcard. Address written on recto, message written on verso. Printed text and stamp in green ink across top: 'POST CARD' with the British royal coat of arms between 'POST' and 'CARD'. Below that is printed 'The address to be written on this side." in small caps. Printed half-penny stamp in upper right. Circular postmark in black ink reads: OXFORD/6.30.PM/No 19/05/3. '52' written in pencil above left of printed stamp. '52' overwritten on top of erased pencil mark, possibly '60'.
Printed postcard heading at top reads:
objectDesc.ab:
POST CARD
THE ADDRESS TO BE WRITTEN ON THIS SIDE.

recordHist.p: Images taken from Trinity College, Dublin: Page 1Page 2

projectDesc.p: This document was created as part of a final project [insert further info/link on edition] by Sarah Tew in fulfillment of a Laurea Magistrale in Digital Humanities and Digital Knowledge at the University of Bologna under the supervision of Dr. Giulio Iovine (sponsor) and Dr. Paola Italia (co-sponsor) and in affiliation with Dr. Todd Hickey, Director of the Center for Tebtunis Papyri at the University of California, Berkeley.

editorialDecl.p: Text has been transcribed diplomatically without corrections, normalization, or standardization.

punctuation.p: All punction marks have been retained nd represented using the appropriate Unicode code character except for apostrophes and ampersands which have been escaped using ' and &, respectively.

segmentation.p: The text has been segmented into lines according to line breaks in the original text automatically by Transkribus and line groupings based on groups identified automatically or manually declared by Sarah Tew in Transkribus. Page breaks have been manually edited by Sarah Tew after export from Transkribus.

handNotes.handNote: Written in black ink by B.P. Grenfell.

revisionDesc.change: Manually added TEI header to Transkribus tei.xml exported file.

body.ab:
POST CARD
THE ADDRESS TO BE WRITTEN ON THIS SIDE.

Hibeh I goes to Press tomorrow & I leave
in the afternoon. I am sending J.P.M. a
proof of the whole vol, and you will receive
proof of the it all except the introd. and
literary pieces. Have you got your ticket?
We shall leave Cairo for Benimazar on
about Dec. 4th. Keep an eye open for J.G.
Milne in Egypt. He is starting on the 29th & will
probably be at the Hotel du Nil.
